ing: 2 cups fresh or thawed frozen blueberries
des: "The foods in this easy recipe are powerhouses of nutrition. Why this recipe is good for you:   Low saturated fat;   High antioxidants;   Gut-protecting bacteria in Ginger is a mild anti-blood-clotting agent;   Eating 6 ounces of yogurt a day reduced hay-fever attacks and colds in a University of California at Davis study."
ins: In each of four parfait glasses or tall wineglasses, put 1/2 cup blueberries, followed by 1/2 cup yogurt, then crumbled gingersnaps.
